page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ME
page.content: {My name is Nicholas Lunn.} On Sunday the 2nd. of June in the morning I was up Abisters and I was playing with my yoyo.Then I went to have some rice crispies and after, I went to go on the B.B.C. B. micro- computer.The game was Astroids and after that we went to mend Taricks radio controlled car. Then we rode the B.M.X.bikes and Tarick fell off and cut his hand.We sprayed his platform pedals silver. Then we had a barbeque of steak, chicken and garlic bread.For afters we had fruit salad . Then we rode to the stud and rode back again. We went home to bed at nine o'clock.
